name: Spectral Freeze
description:
This algorithm is an audio ‘freeze’ effect – it captures sound at a moment in time and sustains it indefinitely. The ‘spectral’ part of the name indicates that it works in the frequency domain, unlike simple loopers or granular effects which work in the time domain. It captures the spectrum of a sound (using FFT) and uses that to resynthesize audio via phase vocoder technique.

As well as completely freezing sound, the algorithm can play it back at any desired speed (time stretching) and pitch. Multiple voices allow freezing different moments simultaneously.

The GUI visualizes each voice’s envelope level and frozen segment. Movement parameters enable dynamic playback within a history window, while pitch shifting and etherization effects further modify the output.
short_description: An audio ‘freeze’ effect that captures sound in the frequency domain and sustains it indefinitely with dynamic playback control.
use_cases: Creating textural sustained sounds from transients
gui_description: Displays voice envelopes, frozen segments (vertical lines), and a 'T' marker indicating the freeze target. Shows FFT frame-based movement parameters with equivalent time in milliseconds.

parameters.name: Freeze toggle
parameters.description: Activates a new freeze when the parameter changes from '0' to '1'.

parameters.name: Freeze gate
parameters.description: Activates a new freeze when changing from '0' to '1', and releases the freeze when changing from '1' to '0'.

parameters.name: Freeze target
parameters.description: Chooses the voice for the next freeze, or '0' for 'Auto'.

parameters.name: Unfreeze all
parameters.description: When set to '1', releases all active freezes.

parameters.name: Rate
parameters.description: '0' stops motion; '1000' is normal speed. Non-linear scale for finer control at slower speeds.

parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Maximum amount of movement in FFT frames (with equivalent time shown). '1' disables motion.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Directly controls playback position within the buffer. Combined with Movement/Rate/Depth.

parameters.name: Live process
parameters.description: When set to '1', starts a new voice using live audio input (for etherization on live audio).

parameters.name: Fine shift (global)
parameters.description: Sets fine pitch shift amount for all voices in cents.

parameters.name: Freeze (per-voice)
parameters.description: Activates/releases freeze on corresponding voice when toggled between '0' and '1'.

parameters.name: Coarse shift (per-voice)
parameters.description: Sets coarse pitch shift amount for individual voices.

parameters.name: Output bus (per-voice)
parameters.description: Sets the output bus for each voice.
